Situati a soli 2 km dal centro paese, go: Located just 2 km from the town center, enjoy the tranquility of the countryside with the convenience of nearby services, easily accessible thanks to the municipal shuttle and local buses.
L'accesso a VINCANTO avviene attraverso: Access to VINCANTO is via a staircase of about 200 steps, a charming path winding through greenery. We consider these steps part of the authentic charm of the place, a small 'formichelle path' once used to transport precious lemons. Climbing up will reward you with an unbeatable view and the feeling of reaching a hidden corner of paradise, far from the daily hustle. It's an invitation to slow down, connect with nature, and enjoy the peace that only places like this can offer.

Ogni dettaglio di VINCANTO è pensato per: Every detail of VINCANTO is designed to offer you an unforgettable stay. The interiors, completely renovated, combine contemporary design and fine materials: elegant porcelain stoneware floors and coverings, refined furnishings and high-quality finishes. The new PVC windows ensure silence and comfort, while mosquito nets on doors and windows let you enjoy the country breeze in total relaxation.
